summary: Tired of stopping at the local smith only to find they don\'t have a smelter or a workbench? No more!
descriptionHtml:
1.1 Adds more forges to complete Completed Forges. Specifics;
---------------------------
  Dawnstar - Removed the extended porch, put a tree back, and shifted the ground to accommodate a forge.
   Morthal - Added an entire forge next to the mill, along with a basic blacksmith NPC.
  Winterhold - Added an entire forge behind the Inn in Winterhold, along with a basic blacksmith NPC. An alternate file is available that instead puts the smith by the college bridge.

---------------------
1.0
This mod just uses the Creation Kit to tweak around the blacksmiths in Dawnstar, Falkreath, Riften, Solitude, Silent Moons Camp, and Whiterun. Here are the specific changes:
-------------------------------------
   Dawnstar - Extended the porch, cleared some scenery, add a smelter and sharpening wheel.
  Falkreath - Cleared some shrubs, added a smelter
   Riften - Moved the wood chopping block and pile around the Black Briar Meadery, added a smelter
  Silent Moons Camp - Added a tanning rack, added some leather strips
   Solitude - Removed a table, moved the workbench, tanning rack, and sharpening wheel, added a smelter
  Skyforge - Added a smelter, workbench, and tanning rack.
----------------------------
This mod has only been lightly tested, so if you have any abnormalities, please let me know, or feel free to fix it yourself.

To install, simply drop the .esp file into your Data folder and enable it.
author: Klimm
